Title: Authorizes the creation of state debt in creating the Alzheimer's research bond act of 2022 and provides for submission to the people of such proposal
Summary: Authorizes the creation of state debt in the amount of 1 billion dollars in creating the Alzheimer's research bond act of 2022 and provides for submission to the people of such proposal.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the creation of a state debt in the amount of one billion dollars, in relation to enacting the Alzheimer's research bond act of 2022 and providing for the submission to the people of a proposition or question therefor to be voted upon at the general election to be held in November, 2022
